posts.post_content:
Selling another T205 from my aborted attempt at starting a set.

$x,xxx delivered within the United States. (As far as "MK" designations go, I think the small mark on the reverse in the lower-right corner is about as unobtrusive as you can get.)

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment. (Check, cash, money order also OK and preferred).

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes: 

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/t205-cobb.jpg[/IMG]
